items.title: Government to review 'information failures' in British-Egyptian activist case
items.description: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says she and Sir Keir Starmer were unaware of Alaa Abd El Fattah's "abhorrent" historical tweets.

items.title: Anthony Joshua injured in fatal Nigeria car crash
items.description: The British heavyweight boxer suffered minor injuries in the crash which killed two people, near Lagos.

items.title: Beyonc√© declared a billionaire by Forbes
items.description: The star joins Taylor Swift, Rihanna, Bruce Springsteen and her husband Jay-Z with 10-figure fortunes.

items.title: Why Israel's recognition of Somaliland as an independent state is controversial
items.description: Somaliland wants international recognition - here's why, and what could have driven Israel to recognise it now.

items.title: Claudia Winkleman to host new chat show on BBC One
items.description: It will be produced by So Television, which is also behind Graham Norton's award-winning chat show.
